comments.body: This is needed to link worksheets to dependency sources that were opened by them. This would not work properly before.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +10,14 @@-- and worksheets they belong to. Required to know what classpath to use
-- for compiling dependency sources.
create table worksheet_dependency_source(
  text_document_uri varchar primary key,
  worksheet_uri varchar not null
